list.name: Event
list.rawQuery: SELECT extract(epoch from ts) AS time,  msg as text, concat_ws(',', level, code, cmd_tag) AS tags FROM ${log} WHERE sid = '$sid'

author: Vonng (rh@vonng.com)
description: PostgreSQL Log Analysis for single session

links.title: Auto Zoom
links.tooltip: Adjust Time Range to Session Log Events

list.description: Last log timestamp of this session
